summary: Frontend testing of image search on 'Recherche' page completed successfully. All reported bugs are FIXED. Image search returns 15 real images from Wikimedia Commons (no ? placeholders), Download button works without crashing the app, and fallback links appear when no images are found.
passed_tests: Image search for 'Burg' returns 15 results from Wikimedia Commons
Images display with correct thumbnails (no ? placeholders)
ImageWithFallback component handles image loading correctly
Download button click does not crash the app
View (Ansehen) button links to Wikimedia Commons page
Fallback links appear when no images found (Wikimedia Commons, Pixabay, Unsplash)
Search functionality remains stable after multiple searches
German localization correct throughout Recherche page
context_for_next_testing_agent: Image search bug is FIXED. The backend now uses Wikimedia Commons API with proper User-Agent header. Frontend ImageWithFallback component handles image loading/errors gracefully. All image search features on Recherche page are working correctly: real images display, download works, fallback links appear when needed.
